file.name: empty_record.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: refComponent
  description: refComponent
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.{host}.io/v1
paths:
  /path01:
    put:
      summary: 02 Example for rb has inline requestbody.
      operationId: updateUser
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            application/json: {}
          description: "Response"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                description: "Array description"
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
        tag:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
    Dog:
      type: object
